## Introduction
`h2o` is an open source Machine Learning library that can be used in both R and Python. It provides easy and fast solutions for huge datasets. In this tutorial we will demonstrate how to use this package for machine learning.  

## Install and Load the Library
```{r setup, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
#install one time only
#install.packages("h2o")
library(h2o)
```
